Sinhala Script Encoding Standards

Contributions to Unicode and SLS1134 standards for Sinhala script encoding and text rendering.

Year 2014 – 2099
Context Community
Status Ongoing

Active contributor to Sinhala script encoding at Unicode and SLS1134 (Sri Lanka Standard 1134), and to Indic text rendering capabilities in open-source software including Libre Graphics tools.

This work ensures that Sinhala text is correctly encoded, stored, and rendered across operating systems, software, and web platforms — the invisible infrastructure that makes Sinhala digital typography possible.

Tags: unicode sinhala encoding sls1134 standards open-source text-rendering
